# Tender Announcement
## 23375-240261 Bulk Nitrogen (N2) Delivery System 

### Tender Details

* **Reference:** WS4229794502 
* **Modification:** 2
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-17
* **Tender Close Date:** 2023-11-17T14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-11-18
* **Contract Start Date:** 2023-11-27
* **Contract End Date:** N/A (Further information can be found in the tender package)

### Tender Status
The tender was cancelled. For further information regarding the tender status, please refer to the notice URL.

### Request for Proposal

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

### Product/Service Requirements

* The procurement intends to acquire a bulk nitrogen (N2) delivery system to support the high-pressure research facility for a period of five years.
* Delivery: The tenderer is required to deliver the product/service to 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada (please refer to the tender package for more details)

### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, Canada K1A 0S5

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** Zimmerling, Nicole (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** nicole.zimmerling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** (Not available)
* **Contact Fax:** (Not available)

### Notice URL 
[Please refer to the official tender notice link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17743765?extsite=MTc3NDM3NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
